about_the_game:
Add-on for Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii including outfits for legendary characters like Kazuma Kiryu, Taiga Saejima, and more, as well as original t-shirts that you're able to change into.

■ LEGENDARY CHARACTER SPECIAL OUTFIT SET
- Special Outfit: Kazuma Kiryu (Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth)
- Special Outfit: Daigo Dojima
- Special Outfit: Taiga Saejima
- Special Outfit: Shun Akiyama
- Special Outfit: Akira Nishikiyama
- Special Outfit: Koichi Adachi
- Special Outfit: Yu Namba
- Special Outfit: Eric Tomizawa
- Special Outfit: Tianyou Zhao
- Special Outfit: Joongi Han

■ SPECIAL T-SHIRT SET
- Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii Original T-shirt 1
- Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii Original T-shirt 2
- Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii Original T-shirt 3
- Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii Original T-shirt 4
- Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii Original T-shirt 5

*Please be aware that the additional content included in this pack is also sold in separate sets or editions.
*You must own a copy of Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii in order to use this add-on content. Please update the game by downloading the latest patch and updating before using it.
*The “Legendary Outfit Pack” will be available after the ability to change outfits is unlocked in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The contents of the ""Legendary Outfit Pack"" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.
